entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
